Class TableDAO

java.lang.Object
project.persistence.product.abstr.TableDAO
Direct Known Subclasses:
PostGresTableDAO
public abstract class TableDAO extends Object
Created by Simplify members on 22/12/22. This class is the DAO of the table It is used to communicate with the database It's a singleton
Author:
Simplify members
